thread.title: ​Jewish Arts and Book Fest opens Wednesday
thread.title_full: ​Jewish Arts and Book Fest opens Wednesday | www.daytondailynews.com

author: Russell Florence Jr.
title: ​Jewish Arts and Book Fest opens Wednesday
text:
A strong assortment of award-winning authors and thought-provoking topics encompassing comedy, politics, musical theater, sports, and more comprise this year’s promising Jewish Community Center of Greater Dayton’s Cultural Arts and Book Festival, an annual showcase beginning this week and continuing through early December at various venues.
The festival’s mission is to educate and entertain by promoting awareness, appreciation and pride to the diversity of the Jewish People and the community at large.
Continue reading on MyDaytonDailyNews.com. »
